text.language: Tenouwst m~Viwt nem Ps/ri: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: ,ere ]ekkl/cia: p~/i n~te niaggeloc.
We worship the Father and the Son, and the Holy Spirit, hail to the Church, the house of angels.

language.div: Kami menyembah Bapa dan Putra, Dan Roh Kudus, Salam bagi Gereja, Rumah malaikat

text.language: نسجد للآب والإبن والروح القدس السلام للكنيسة بيت الملائكة.
<ere ]paryenoc: e~tacmec Pencwt/r: ,ere Gabri/l: e~tafhisennoufi nac.
Hail to the Virgin, who gave birth to our Savior, hail to Gabriel who announced, to her the Good News.

language.div: Salam bagi perawan, yang melahirkan jurus’lamat kita, Salam bagi Gabriel, pemberi kabar

text.language: السلام للعذراء التى ولدت مخلصنا السلام لغبريال الذى بشرها.
<ere Mi,a/l: piar,/aggeloc: ,ere pijout f~tou: m~p~recbuteroc.
Hail to Michael, the archangel, hail to the twenty-four, presbyters.

language.div: Salam bagi Mikail, penghulu malaikat, salam bagi dua puluh empat, tua tua

text.language: السلام لميخائيل رئيس الملائكة السلام للأربعة والعشرين قسيساً.
<ere ni,eroubim: ,ere niceravim: ,ere nitagma t/rou: n~e~pouranion.
Hail to the cherubim, hail to the seraphim, hail to all the hosts, of the heavens.

language.div: Salam bagi Kerubim, Salam bagi Serafim, Salam bagi semua, Susunan surgawi

text.language: السلام للشاروبيم السلام للسارافيم السلام لجميع الطغمات السمائية.
<ere Iwann/c: pinis] m~p~rodromoc: ,ere pim/t c~nau: n~a~poctoloc.
Hail to John, the great forerunner, hail to the, twelve apostles.

language.div: Salam bagi Yohanes, sang pendahulu agung, Salam bagi, dua belas rasul

text.language: السلام ليوحنا السابق العظيم السلام للاثنى عشر رسولا.
<ere peniwt Markoc: pieuaggelict/c: pirefjwr e~bol: n~te nii~dwlon.
Hail to our father Mark, the Evangelist, the destroyer, of the idols.

language.div: Salam bagi, Bapa kami Markus, Sang Penginjil, Penghancur berhala

text.language: السلام لأبينا مرقس الانجيلى مبدد الأوثان.
<ere Ctevanoc: pisorp m~marturoc: ,ere Gewrgioc: piciou n~te hana~tooui.
Hail to Stephen, the first martyr, hail to George, the morning star.

language.div: Salam bagi Stefanus, Martir pertama, Salam bagi George, Bintang pagi

text.language: السلام لاستفانوس الشهيد الاول السلام لجرجس كوكب الصبح.
<ere p~,oroc t/rf: n~te nimarturoc: ,ere Abba Antwni: nem pisomt Makarioc.
Hail to the whole choir, of the martyrs, hail to Abba Anthony, and the three Macarii.

language.div: Salam bagi semua, Paduan suara martir, Salam bagi abba Antonious, Dan tiga Makari

text.language: السلام لجميع صفوف الشهداء السلام لأنبا انطونيوس والثلاثة المقارات.
<ere p~,oroc t/rf: n~te nic~taurovoroc: ,ere n/e#y#u# t/rou: e~tafranaf m~Po#c#.
Hail to the whole choir, of the cross-bearers, hail to all the saints, who have pleased the Lord.

language.div: Salam bagi paduan suara, pemikul Salib, Salam bagi para kudus, yang menyenangkan Tuhan

text.language: السلام لجميع صفوف لُباس الصليب السلام لجميع القديسين الذين أرضوا الرب.
Hiten noueu,/: P,#c# Penouro: a~riounai neman: qen tekmetouro.
Through their prayers, O Christ our King, have mercy upon us, in Your kingdom.

language.div: Melalui doa m’reka, ya Kristus raja kami, Kasihanilah kami, Di Kerajaan-Mu

text.language: أيها المسيح ملكنا بصلواتهم إصنع معنا رحمة فى ملكوتك.
